title: Hitchcock Polish Poster Serif
content:
Anyone have any ideas? Thought is might be a condensed form of Century, but that K's got me stumped.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818185424im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hitchserif_5392.jpg)
author: martinzero

comments.content:
If you are willing to do a bit of graphic 'grafting', you could make that K with the R leg from [Egizio Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818185424/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/egizio/). The font itself is otherwise very similar.

- Mike Yanega
